snippet.title: American Success (アメリカンサクセス) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

FM-7
MSX 2

Game description:

American Success is a board video game for 4 players, which can either be human players or computer players.

The goal is to have the highest profit after a certain amount of rounds. You do so by buying tiles like factories or mines. 
Be careful not to land on the hospital tile or else you will have to sit out a few rounds.
If you get to the lucky tile you can choose a card that will give you a bonus...or the opposite. You can't see what's written on the cards though.
There are also natural disasters like earthquakes that can ruin tiles or even completely take a tile away from a player.
